# BasePropertiesTable.Contains method

Determines whether ICollection contains a specific value.

```csharp
public bool Contains(PropertyItem item)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| item | Object to be searched in ICollection |

## Return Value

`true` if *item* is in the array ICollection; otherwise, `false`.
